function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Handling of PCR reagents and samples in a laboratory setting poses a risk of contamination and spread of infectious diseases.","Impact":"Uncontrolled contamination can lead to the spread of infectious diseases within the laboratory and to individuals handling the samples.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to laboratory protocols, use of personal protective equipment, and regular decontamination of work surfaces and equipment.","Technologies":"Laboratory safety protocols, biosafety cabinets, and autoclaves for decontamination.","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, and anyone present in the vicinity of the laboratory work.","Owner":"Laboratory management, biosafety officers, and researchers."}]}
